lines.text: Fond of cats, aren't you, Young?
They attract me - creatures of the night.
The way Pug behaves reminds me of my old man; only he used to say it was love.
Only a fool makes powerful enemies.

[praying]
In thee, master, may I find greater wisdom, greater strength, and greater courage...
Looks like he was out for trouble.
Yes, well, he certainly found it.
We were, shall we say, business rivals.
The older I grow, the less I argue with a man in love.
You can't mix mongrels with thoroughbreds.
Half white. Half yellow. All luck.
